atom

Class Atom

  • java.lang.Object
    • atom.Atom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomMD

    public class Atom
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Stores the data of atom. Units in atomic units. This class includes the following data:
    1. Label
    2. Mass (emu)
    3. Atomic number
    4. Cartesian coordinates (bohr)
    5. Charge of atom (e)
    6. Beta value
    7. Occupation number
    8. ID
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Atom()
      Generates an empty atom.
      Atom(int atomicNumber)
      Generates an atom with atomic number.
